title: This Valentine's Day, money is indeed buying them love
description: Properties such as The Oberoi Udaivilas and Fairmont Jaipur have no rooms available for February 14, as per Booking.com. Rajesh Namby, general manager of Raffles Udaipur, said the hotel has seen a “remarkable” surge in bookings and expects a 22-27% revenue growth with an increase in average daily rates around Valentine’s Day.
